channel.title: ADSR object workings?
channel.description:
Hi All, so I started looking in the .axo stuff a bit and I thought to modify the factory ADSR envelope to an ADBSR one but I have to get around to how this all works so euhm... this is already pretty much a challenge to me.
I think I understand the in/out stuff, the trigger stages of the envelope, the MTOF, USAT, SMMUL (sort of - been googling on PureData and ARM command set) but how does this envelope calculate over time? What's the best start on getting further into this?
G

item.title: ADSR object workings?
item.dc:creator: @grit Gritty_Dee
item.description:
